Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, we're on the second step of the program today—combat mode training.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Combat mode training?', 3: '6', 4: "You don't have to worry about that as a Support-type, right?", 5: '7'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'To learn how to use weapons outside of my Levi-Gun.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia mentioned that the more you master, the better it is.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Despite having different combat systems in our frames, it doesn't mean that we can utilize them perfectly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Even without Lee pointing it out, I know that I often lose my cool during intense battles.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But using my Levi-Gun requires my utmost focus—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If I lose control over the Levi-Gun, I'll have to take the time to recalibrate my connection with them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "In this case, I think it's essential for me to master other fighting styles to be helpful during reconnection. Like using a sword, for example.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'And I think you like squad members who can strike the enemies with their blades at melee distance, such as Lucia, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's true.", 3: '15', 4: "There's nothing wrong with ranged fighters like you, either.", 5: '16'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hmm... Then maybe I should learn to use light weapons like Lee and Bianca?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Anyhow, I want to give every kind of weapon a try. Just provide me with the challenges like you did last time, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Place targets and obstacles in the area for me to destroy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Tell me when to start, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: "And I'm just observing from the side again?", 3: '21', 4: 'You can do this, Liv!', 5: '22'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "(Nods) I won't need to trouble you with this!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I will do my best!', 4: '1'}
